lines: LET JESUS COME INTO YOUR HEART
1. Nga wafininwa ne mpulumushi, Yesu leka'be mu mweo;
Ngo lefwayo be no mweo upya, Yesu leka'be mu mweo.
2. Ngo lefwayo kut'ubutishiwe, Yesu leka'be mu mweo:
Utufukauka tuli pepi, Yesu leka 'be mu mweo
3. Ngo li na macusho 'shingacimfya, Yesu leka'be mu mweo,
Nokusango kwafwiwa mu calo. Yesu leka'be mu mweo.
4. Nge fibusa fyafuma kuli 'we, Yesu leka'be mu mweo;
Wene nicibusa wa cishinka, Yesu leka 'be mu mweo.
5. Ngo lefwaisha ukumwishiba, Yesu leka'be mu mweo;
Ngo lefwaya kuba mumasano, Yesu leka'be mu mweo.
